resources.string: The server address could not be resolved. Please verify Semantic Scuttle server URL in the settings.
The server response is invalid. Please verify Semantic Scuttle server URL in the settings.
Your username and password are not accepted. Please verify your authentication settings.
It seems that the server address is incorrect. Please verify Semantic Scuttle server URL in the settings.
An error occured while trying to establish a SSL (https) connection with the server.
An error occured while trying to communicate with the server.
